title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 15 January 2017 - XWiki
content:
<Aranjedeath> has quit  
09:00 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:02 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> has joined #xwiki  
09:02 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> hi everyone, just wanted to know whether xwiki supports user mentions or not (using @ to tag someone in a comment or page)  
09:45 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> has quit  
10:40 <raphael29\_> has joined #xwiki  
12:04 <gopal86> has joined #xwiki  
12:41 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
12:44 <mflorea> has quit  
12:47 <vmassol> has quit  
13:46 <xwikiorg\_guest\_0> has joined #xwiki  
13:46 <xwikiorg\_guest\_0> Hi everyone  
14:08 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:09 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:16 <xwikiorg\_guest\_0> has quit  
14:21 <jayaura> has joined #xwiki  
14:23 <jayaura> Hi  
14:23 <jayaura> I tried installing xwiki using debian pacakge  
14:23 <jayaura> but its not starting  
14:23 <jayaura> log: https://paste.gnome.org/pecyx4uus  
14:23 <jayaura> i am new to tomcat  
14:23 <jayaura> please advice how to fix this issue  
14:24 <vmassol> has quit  
14:36 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:38 <vmassol> has quit  
14:39 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:42 <vmassol> has quit  
14:46 <jayaura> Made some progress: I am looking at http://tomcat.10.x6.nabble.com/Tomcat8-WARNING-Problem-with-directory-usr-share-tomcat8-common-td5053957.html  
14:46 <jayaura> So it seems in my debian installation, those classes go to /usr/share/tomcat8/lib  
14:47 <jayaura> now how do I tell tomcat to look for this directory instead of the default which it is looking for ?  
14:49 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:52 <vmassol> has quit  
14:52 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:56 <vmassol> has quit  
15:16 <jayaura> okay new question: I can see an error unsupported version 52: https://paste.gnome.org/pmqbcfd1f  
15:17 <jayaura> I had java 7 first, and I had the same error. I installed java8, and changed the default java version to 8, using update-alternatives.  
15:17 <jayaura> but still I am getting the version error  
15:44 <jayaura> ah it was the tomcat java version I need to set  
15:45 <jayaura> got it running  
15:47 <mflorea> has quit  
15:52 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki
